channel.title: Welcome to my website on Patricia Meneéndez
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my website on Patricia Meneéndez

item.title: Homeward Bound
item.description: I have had the priviledge to be selected together with another 99 women to take part in Homeward Bound. Homeward bound is a groundbreaking leadership program for women with a background in STEMM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, and Medicine).
